Description: Verify folder(s) are correctly deleted.

Determine whether non-copyable page content such as UI widgets are
      correctly omitted from the Clipboard content.

Determine whether extremely large text blocks can be copied from web
      pages.

Confirm that text, links, and images dragged to a
      non-modal dialog are handled properly

Description:

Determine whether Help Contents displays correctly
Determine whether Streamlined Interface displays correctly
Determine whether the Feedback Center displays correctly

Verify that you can remove all username and password information and
      it will no longer autofill nor will anything be listed in password

Feature: Tasks, passwords never saved, remove all
Description:
Verify that you can remove all site and username information from the

Determine whether a page with various formats prints properly
Determine that print range works properly
Determine if flash movies play correctly.
Verify that a search query/results can be bookmarked
Determine whether drag-scrolling gestures function properly.
Verify reordering of panels works
Verify that order and panel list is immediately applied
Access from main menu, keyboard accelerator, access keys.
Find strings in the source window.
Select and copy from the info window.
Verify Modern theme works as advertised

Feature:
Verify all the selectable items on other applications under
        Classic theme
Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar and tool bars under AIM,

Verify the title is correct, "<page title> - Mozilla"

The active window is visually distinct, inactive = grey title
